content.raw:
The implementation itself looks good to me! I have a few questions about the example.

From what I understand the idea is to add a custom tag to the sdf \(origin \+ time / pose\) and use it to teleport the actor at the specific times, I thought some sort of integration with ign-transport would give a more useful use-case? Something along the lines of subscribe to Pose topic and whenever a message is received update the origin pose?

My main worry is that the current example uses tags that don’t exist in the spec \(I admittedly spent more time than I should have looking for them before realizing what was really happening\) and might be a bit confusing.

Not too sure about this though, what do you think?
